N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 567.8 - Award amounts

State Regulations
(a) During each
fiscal year an amount equal to one tenth of one percent of the total M/C
payroll of each agency (total basic annual salaries of the eligible employees
on March 31st of the preceding fiscal year) shall be available for the payment
of Special Achievement Awards. (b) Award amounts for individuals shall be a minimum of $1,000 and are limited to a
maximum of $4,000. The total award for any team project (i.e., the sum of
individual awards) shall not exceed $10,000. Payments shall be lump-sum amounts
and shall not be part of an employee's basic annual salary, but shall be
included as compensation for retirement purposes. Notes
